Divine Parent.quote: As a father has compassion on his children, so the LORD has compassion on those who fear him. (Psalm 103:13)

Divine Beloved.quote: I am my beloved's and my beloved is mine. (Song of Solomon 6:3)

Divine Teacher.quote: But the Helper, the Holy Spirit, whom the Father will send in my name, will teach you all things. (John 14:26)

Divine Friend.quote: I no longer call you servants... Instead, I have called you friends. (John 15:15)

Divine Guide.quote: Your word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path. (Psalm 119:105)

Divine Protector.quote: The LORD is my shepherd, I lack nothing. (Psalm 23:1)

Divine Master.quote: No one can serve two masters. Either you will hate the one and love the other. (Matthew 6:24)

Divine Companion.quote: And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age. (Matthew 28:20)

Divine Healer.quote: I am the LORD, who heals you. (Exodus 15:26)

Divine Creator.quote: For you created my inmost being; you knit me together in my mother's womb. (Psalm 139:13)

Divine Mother.quote: As a mother comforts her child, so will I comfort you. (Isaiah 66:13)

Divine Lover.quote: Many waters cannot quench love; rivers cannot sweep it away. (Song of Solomon 8:7)

Divine Guru.quote: By the Guru's grace, divine knowledge is revealed. (Guru Granth Sahib)

Divine Partner.quote: For we are co-workers in God's service. (1 Corinthians 3:9)

Divine Witness.quote: The eyes of the LORD are everywhere, keeping watch on the wicked and the good. (Proverbs 15:3)

Divine Sustainer.quote: In him we live and move and have our being. (Acts 17:28)

Divine Confidant.quote: Pour out your heart before Him; God is a refuge for us. (Psalm 62:8)

Divine Bridegroom.quote: As the bridegroom rejoices over the bride, so shall your God rejoice over you. (Isaiah 62:5)

Divine Provider.quote: And my God will meet all your needs according to the riches of his glory. (Philippians 4:19)

Divine Refuge.quote: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble. (Psalm 46:1)

Divine Liberator.quote: So if the Son sets you free, you will be free indeed. (John 8:36)

Divine Counselor.quote: I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go; I will counsel you with my loving eye on you. (Psalm 32:8)

Divine Partner in Dialogue.quote: Come now, let us reason together, says the LORD. (Isaiah 1:18)

Divine Co-Creator.quote: For we are God's handiwork, created in Christ Jesus to do good works. (Ephesians 2:10)

Divine Mirror.quote: For now we see only a reflection as in a mirror; then we shall see face to face. (1 Corinthians 13:12)

Divine Advocate.quote: My dear children, I write this to you so that you will not sin. But if anybody does sin, we have an advocate. (1 John 2:1)

Divine Gardener.quote: I am the true vine, and my Father is the gardener. (John 15:1)

Divine Host.quote: You prepare a table before me in the presence of my enemies. (Psalm 23:5)

Divine Artist.quote: For we are God's masterpiece, created in Christ Jesus for good works. (Ephesians 2:10)

Divine Physician.quote: It is not the healthy who need a doctor, but the sick. (Matthew 9:12)

Divine Judge.quote: For the LORD is our judge, the LORD is our lawgiver, the LORD is our king. (Isaiah 33:22)

Divine Transformer.quote: And we all, who with unveiled faces contemplate the Lord's glory, are being transformed into his image. (2 Corinthians 3:18)

Divine Shepherd.quote: He tends his flock like a shepherd: He gathers the lambs in his arms. (Isaiah 40:11)

Divine Light.quote: The LORD is my light and my salvationâ€”whom shall I fear? (Psalm 27:1)

Divine Potter.quote: Yet you, LORD, are our Father. We are the clay, you are the potter; we are all the work of your hand. (Isaiah 64:8)

Divine Dance Partner.quote: Then maidens will dance and be glad, young men and old as well. I will turn their mourning into gladness. (Jeremiah 31:13)
